channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 亚洲日经指数反弹在日本并非一闪而过
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 美国国务院同意向澳大利亚出售战斧武器系统
item.description: The U.S. State Department has approved the possible sale of Tomahawk weapons system support services and related equipment to Australia for $250 million, U.S. Defense Security Cooperation Agency said on Wednesday.翻译:美国国防安全合作局周三表示，美国国务院已批准以 2.5 亿美元的价格向澳大利亚出售战斧武器系统支持服务及相关设备。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 焦点：在 CES 上，传统汽车制造商竞相跟上人工智能军备竞赛
item.description: As artificial intelligence becomes the new horsepower for car buyers, established automakers are redoubling efforts to match the digital features that set Tesla , BYD and other new rivals apart, industry executives and analysts said at the CES technology show in Las Vegas.翻译:行业高管和分析师在拉斯维加斯举行的 CES 技术展上表示，随着人工智能成为汽车购买者的新动力，老牌汽车制造商正在加倍努力，以匹配使特斯拉、比亚迪和其他新竞争对手脱颖而出的数字功能。
item.author: Abhirup Roy, Joseph White

item.title: 耶伦表示特朗普的关税计划将增加美国消费者的成本
item.description: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen on Wednesday said Republican former President Donald Trump's plan to raise tariffs 10% across the board would raise costs for U.S. consumers, although the United States needs some tariffs and is reviewing those linked to China.翻译:美国财政部长珍妮特·耶伦周三表示，共和党前总统唐纳德·特朗普全面提高关税10%的计划将增加美国消费者的成本，尽管美国需要一些关税，并且正在审查与中国有关的关税。
item.author: David Lawder

item.title: 数十名美国议员支持支持台湾民主的决议-文件
item.description: Dozens of US Congress members are backing legislation praising democracy in Taiwan, a measure likely to anger Beijing.翻译:数十名美国国会议员支持赞扬台湾民主的立法，此举可能会激怒北京。
item.author: Michael Martina, Patricia Zengerle

item.title: 厄瓜多尔总统称国家正处于战争状态，黑帮劫持监狱工作人员作为人质
item.description: President Daniel Noboa said that his country was "at war" with drug gangs who are holding over 130 prison guards and other staff hostage.翻译:总统丹尼尔·诺博亚表示，他的国家正与贩毒团伙“交战”，这些团伙将 130 多名狱警和其他工作人员扣为人质。
item.author: Alexandra Valencia

item.title: 欧洲央行前行长德拉吉就欧盟竞争力向商界领袖进行咨询
item.description: Mario Draghi met business leaders in Milan on Wednesday as the former Italian prime minister and European Central Bank chief prepares a report on how to boost the EU's competitiveness.翻译:意大利前总理兼欧洲央行行长马里奥·德拉吉周三在米兰会见了商界领袖，他正在准备一份关于如何提高欧盟竞争力的报告。
item.author: Elvira Pollina, Giselda Vagnoni

item.title: 马尔代夫升级与中国关系，转向印度
item.description: China and the Maldives upgraded their relationship on Wednesday during newly elected President Mohamed Muizzu's first state visit to Beijing, following a campaign in which he cast China's regional rival India as a threat to sovereignty.翻译:周三，在新当选总统穆罕默德·穆伊祖首次对北京进行国事访问期间，中国和马尔代夫升级了两国关系。此前，穆伊祖在竞选活动中将中国的地区竞争对手印度视为主权威胁。
item.author: Joe Cash

item.title: 雷诺寄希望于新车型，梅甘娜降价以对抗法国特斯拉
item.description: Renault is banking on new models and a price cut for its Megane model to help in its battle against U.S. rival Tesla Inc on its home turf, a senior official for the French carmaker told Reuters on Wednesday.翻译:法国汽车制造商雷诺的一位高级官员周三对路透社表示，雷诺正指望推出新车型并降低梅甘娜车型的价格，以帮助其在本土与美国竞争对手特斯拉公司展开竞争。
item.author: Gilles Guillaume

item.title: 2023年俄罗斯新车销量恢复至106万辆
item.description: Sales of new cars in Russia rebounded in 2023 to 1.06 million units, data from Russian analytical agency Autostat showed on Wednesday, as the industry partially recovered from sanctions and the departure of many foreign automakers.翻译:俄罗斯分析机构 Autostat 周三的数据显示，随着该行业从制裁和许多外国汽车制造商退出中部分恢复，2023 年俄罗斯新车销量反弹至 106 万辆。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 巴布亚新几内亚首都遭纵火、抢劫，警察因欠薪罢工
item.description: Shops and businesses were attacked and set on fire in the capital of Papua New Guinea on Wednesday and people had been killed, the governor said, after police went on strike over pay.翻译:巴布亚新几内亚州长表示，警察因工资问题罢工后，周三，商店和企业在巴布亚新几内亚首都遭到袭击和纵火，造成人员死亡。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 意大利忠利集团斥资1.08亿美元发展中国非寿险业务
item.description: Italy's biggest insurer Generali on Wednesday said it would acquire full control of a non-life insurance joint-venture in China by buying out local partner CNPC Capital for around 99 million euros ($108 million).翻译:意大利最大的保险公司Generali周三表示，将以约9900万欧元（1.08亿美元）收购当地合作伙伴中油资本的股份，从而获得对中国一家非寿险合资企业的完全控制权。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国监管机构加倍承诺关注习近平的反腐行动
item.description: China's anti-graft watchdog doubled down on a pledge to relentlessly carry out President Xi Jinping's orders to catch corrupt and disloyal officials, state media said on Wednesday.翻译:官方媒体周三称，中国反腐监管机构加倍努力，承诺坚决执行习近平主席的命令，抓捕腐败和不忠的官员。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: Grifols 向 Gotham 寻求至少相当于股份损失的赔偿——董事会成员
item.description: Spain's pharmaceutical company Grifols will seek a compensation at least equivalent to the share price loss prompted by short seller Gotham City Research's Tuesday report in the lawsuit it plans to launch, a board member told Reuters on Wednesday.翻译:西班牙制药公司 Grifols 的一名董事会成员周三告诉路透社，该公司将在其计划发起的诉讼中寻求至少相当于卖空者 Gotham City Research 周二报告所造成的股价损失的赔偿。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 英国将部署军舰、航母进行印度洋联合训练
item.description: Britain said on Wednesday it would send warships to the Indian Ocean later this year and an aircraft carrier to the region in 2025 for joint training and operations with Indian forces as the two countries strengthen their security ties.翻译:英国周三表示，随着两国加强安全关系，英国将在今年晚些时候向印度洋派遣军舰，并于 2025 年向该地区派遣一艘航空母舰，与印度军队进行联合训练和行动。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: Transneft：2023 年俄罗斯通过其网络的石油出口量下降 6.5%
item.description: Russian state-controlled oil pipeline monopoly Transneft said on Wednesday that Russian crude exports via its pipelines were down 6.5% last year, while total oil deliveries through its network in 2023 had remained flat from 2022.翻译:俄罗斯国家控制的石油管道垄断企业Transneft周三表示，去年俄罗斯通过其管道的原油出口量下降了6.5%，而2023年通过其网络的石油输送总量与2022年持平。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：华尔街关注消费者物价指数和比特币波动，日本大放异彩
item.description: A look at the day ahead in US and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 芬兰表示，芬兰和中国国家主席讨论了管道损坏问题
item.description: Finland's President Sauli Niinisto said on Wednesday he had held constructive talks with China's President Xi Jinping over the damage inflicted last year to the Balticconnector gas pipeline linking Finland and Estonia.翻译:芬兰总统绍利·尼尼斯托周三表示，他与中国国家主席习近平就去年连接芬兰和爱沙尼亚的波罗的海天然气管道遭受的损害进行了建设性会谈。
item.author: Anne Kauranen, Liz Lee

item.title: 习近平向艾奥瓦州老朋友表示世界需要中美关系稳定
item.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping, in a recent reply to a letter from an Iowa native whom he first met nearly four decades ago, said the world's future demanded stability in Sino-U.S. ties, according to Chinese state media on Wednesday.翻译:据中国官方媒体周三报道，中国国家主席习近平最近在回信一位爱荷华州人的来信中表示，世界的未来需要中美关系的稳定。他与爱荷华州人在近四十年前首次会面。
item.author: Ryan Woo

item.title: 台湾事实上的驻美大使会见美国众议院议长，中国激怒
item.description: Taiwan's de facto ambassador to the United States met on Tuesday with U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Mike Johnson, Taiwan's foreign ministry said on Wednesday, drawing a stern rebuke from Beijing.翻译:台湾外交部周三表示，台湾事实上的驻美国大使周二会见了美国众议院议长迈克·约翰逊，此举遭到北京方面的严厉谴责。
item.author: Reuters
